After many soviet games, I found out that to stop the German spearhead, you have to have your own armors striking at their rear. I don't advise tank destroyer divisions because these are usually soft themselves and hard attack will not help you much, since a tank division with motorized and SP-ART is like %50 hard, which makes wielding low soft and high hard bad. Instead, try to cut them off while they advance. Unless they are making a small encirclement, they will leave motorized behind, which is easy prey for your tanks.

Tank destroyer divisions tend to be soft themselves, meanwhile main panzer divisions are %50 soft. So it doesn't matter if you have more hard attack or not, their panzer divisions will wreck your tank destroyer ones, since they have artillery. I tested this a lot, only way to stop the blitzkrieg is with your own tank armies with blitzkrieg researched. I don't rely on forts, and you need to have mobile warfare doctrine researched to match German panzers.
